Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/Prelude/Relation/toMap
Synopsis Indexes a binary relation as a map
Function map[&K, set[&V]] toMap(rel[&K, &V] R)
Usage import Relation;
Description Converts a binary relation to a map of the domain to a set of the range.
Examples 
rascal>import Relation;
ok
rascal>toMap({<1,10>, <2,20>, <3,30>, <30,10>});
map[int, set[int]]: (
  30:{10},
  3:{30},
  2:{20},
  1:{10}
)
